p: (3) Change of the Anion. The anions from the usual bromide comp. 44 were changed to chloride and also to iodide (comp. 45 and comp. 46). According to IC 50 and LD 50 data, the change of the anion did not have any influence on the cytotoxicity in NIH3T3 cell lines; IC 50 values were around 30 μg/ml.
